page.title: 03LIFE STYLES
page.content: The following conclusions were reached after conducting a door-to-door survey in the area.The{population}was mainly aged between 16 and 65, with only a few{juveniles}and{pensioners. Although the area is located in an oil-influenced area, the most predominant type of employment found was{farming;}and it is due to this that the greatest number of people go to work on foot or bicycle, closely followed by car. Most families own one car, and a smaller percentage own two. Households shop mainly in{Ellon}for everyday items such as groceries,and travel to{Aberdeen}for more specialised purchases such as clothing and household goods. Most households mentioned homebased {activities}such as walking,television, music or D.I.Y. as their most
